body_html:
I am also confused about Supervisor and SavedModelBuilder.
It seems we can not call add_meta_graph_and_variables() after Supervisor is created unless we unfreeze the graph.
I have also checked MonitoredTrainingSession, it behaves almost the same, and we can not use SessionRunHook for SavedModel either.
add_meta_graph_and_variables() need "session" as a parameter, but both these two api will finalize the graph after the session is created.
Anyone can give some hint on that?

body:
I am also confused about Supervisor and SavedModelBuilder. 
It seems we can not call add_meta_graph_and_variables() after Supervisor is created unless we unfreeze the graph.
I have also checked MonitoredTrainingSession, it behaves almost the same, and we can not use SessionRunHook for SavedModel either. 
add_meta_graph_and_variables() need "session" as a parameter, but both these two api will finalize the graph after the session is created. 
Anyone can give some hint on that?
